name: Yeet the Kid!
description:
We've all been there. School starts soon and you miss the bus. So, what now?

The only solution is to be yeeted across the city!

A game by:
Ruben Buhl - Programming
Luisa Höhne - Concept Art & Character Design
Sarah Ines Roeder - 3D Art
Max Braun - 3D Art

Made within one week as part of a game jam.
